doc.field: New York University Archives Collection of Late 19th Century Photographic Materials
New York University Archives Collection of Late 19th Century Photographic Materials
Series IV. Henry Draper-Related Observatories and Laboratories Images
Series IV. Henry Draper-Related Observatories and Laboratories Images

This series contains images of Henry Draper's lab and observatory in Hastings-on-Hudson, circa 1870s-1880s. This series also includes images from the 1890s related to The Henry Draper Memorial which was established by his widow and involved the transfer of a collection of Draper's instruments and telescopes to Harvard College Observatory. Image subjects include interiors, exteriors, people working in the lab, equipment, and other machinery.
